conversation-text:
Sergeant Charles Daniels: Officer Myers and I observed the, uh, tightrope... dancer, because you couldn't call him a walker, uh, approximately halfway between the two towers. And, uh, upon seeing us, he started to smile and laugh.
Philippe Petit: They don't know how to react to a daydreaming wirewalker laying down and dialoging with a seagull so, they were, really mad.
